availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Micah T. Chrisman (Boyle County, Kentucky, lawyer and clerk of circuit court)

body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, lawyer and clerk of circuit court. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Chrisman. Father of James Chrisman and John T. Chrisman. Clerk of the Boyle County Circuit Court in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, Danville, p. 893.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 05, Boyle County, Kentucky, 1863, p. 135 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Micah T Chrisman (1817-1875)," Memorial #57832411, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/57832411 (accessed June 17, 2020).
